thread.title: Lorain County judge's quick action saves man from drug overdose
thread.title_full: Lorain County judge's quick action saves man from drug overdose

author: Julie Washington, The Plain Dealer
title: Lorain County judge's quick action saves man from drug overdose
text: The opioid crisis literally landed at the doorstep of Lorain County Domestic Relations Judge Sherry Glass, whose quick actions and cool head on Monday helped save a man from a drug overdose.
